111.title: Japan

1112.content:
It was Japanese woman. You walk up to her

"Are you Danieru Johnson?" she asks with a thick. You nod.

"Yes, are you my foreign exchange parent?" She nodded enthusiastically.

" we should get going over to my house."
1112.title: A Woman

choices: During the ride to Nemu's house.
11121.content:
Danieru had signed up for an international program which called for American children to spend the long December holidays under the care of foreign foster parents. It was a UN-peacekeeping initiative sponsored by many American HighSchool's in an action to preserve world peace as well as an opportunity learn about the diverse cultures from around the globe.

Children of all ages could volunteer for this and were tasked with writing a report of their experiences under the guardianship of their culturally different parents, and what they had learned from their homeland. Those writing the most oustanding report would win a prize equal to a quarter million dollars for their school.

But Danieru wasn't interested in all that. He was merely bored. All his friend had planned grand vacations which wold see them leaving his home town and Danieru alone. He refused to spend a month of vacation in isolation and boredom.
But what really convinced him to sign up for the program, was a secret he kept hidden from all his closest of fiends.

He was an orphan. Since birth. He'd kept this hidden from all who asked. He slaved away during highschool working as a pizza-delivery boy to pay for his own school-tuition. The manager took pity on him and gave him a small apartment in which he lived. It was a dump, but it was warm and out of the weather and free. The manager being kind, also agreed to pay for Danieru's school-tuition instead of giving him a salary, a significantly larger amount of money. So he basically worked to have the right to go to school. But Danieru refused to go back to the orphanage and the poverty that came along with it.

The idea of having parents, even if they were temporary foreign exchange parents, brought a warm feeling to Danieru. It was obvious for him to sign up for the program. Plus he could escape his crappy apartment for a whole month.

There were parents from every nation requesting children from America to join them for the holidays. Germany, the Netherlands, South Africa, Britain, everywhere. But Danieru went straight for the Land of the Rising Sun: Japan.
An avid fan of Anime and all Nintendo and Sony games, Danieru was also fascinated by the Japanese. He always wondered how Sake and sushi tasted. Now was his chance.

He found the request of a beautiful Japanese woman who spoke English clearly and decently, but with a thick accent. The requests were in folders containing tape-recorders pictures and letters, where the parents requested what type of children they preferred to have staying with them. The woman's name was Nemu Anaki, and she had requested the company of a boy around 16-years of age.
Danieru fit that description perfectly and applied for her immediately.

His flight ticket was paid for by the UN, and 12 hours of flying later, Danieru touched Jap soil and met his new foster mother.
He could tell she was as excited for having him stay with her, as he was with her.

When they came to the parking lot, Danieru could see immediately that Nemu was exceedingly wealthy. Her car was a bloody Ferrari! From poverty, Danieru could only have dreamed of the chance to touch one, let alone ride.

He had the happy suspicion that his stay would be an exciting one. Little did he know just how much.
11121.title: Meeting

choices: They arrived at Nemu's home in time for dinner.
They arrived at Nemu's home in time for lunch.
111211.content:
Nemu was quite chatty during the ride and relentlessly asked Danieru questions about his home back at America. Where did he live? What did he do? How was the weather in his American hometown? He could hardly keep up.

But he didn't mind. She had already told him how grateful she was that he had decided to stay with her for the vacation and had even told him that if he saw anything in any shop he had all but ask, and she would buy it for him, to which he profusely refused.

Although her accent was thick, her English wasn't only passable, but could also be understood clearly. Danieru was afraid he would get stuck with a family whom he could hardly communicate with at all, since he himself didn't know anything about the Japanese language himself, aside from the odd honorifics. But they bridged the language barrier easily and got along very well during the ride to Nemu's house.

Nemu was as kind as she was beautiful. Her asian features accented by her sleek short hair in a blob style. Her eyes the steriotypical flattened and stretched as associated by the Japanese and often ridiculed by westerners. Danieru found her eyes gorgeous, dark brown pits of mystery. She wore the attire of a professional business woman; dark navy-blue jacket and knee-length skirt, white-collar shirt with a pretty tie, and stockings beneath the skirt to her semi-high heeled shoes.

Danieru was surprised to see her wearing such...what? Normal clothing? In his cardinal stupidity Danieru had almost expected an 18th century geisha to pick him up. In fact he was surprised to see so much of Japan reflecting the modern westernised world.
Streets, signs, cars, buildings, everything looked similar to back home, if you only replaced billboards and signs with the characters of the japanese language and the citizens with the Japanese.

If anyone was the odd one out it was he. Many Japs gave him the odd second look, never having seen a westerner outside television. He smiled at them, especially the children in the cars next him, who gaped in awe at him at every stop sign. Much to his delight many smiled and waved back back proving they weren't the asocialites perceived by westerners. One bloke even held up his camera phone and indicated he wanted to take a picture, to which Danieru gave the shap sign (thumb up), and he gleefully took his picture and thanked him profusely with his hands together.
This horrified Nemu, who didn't realise that Danieru was quite happy with having his picture taken and told him with concern that she didn't want him insulted or badly treated whist in her care.

Danieru further learned from Nemu that her husband was deceased and that she had inherited his multi-million pharmaticules medicine company. Her husbands board of directors wanted to push her out, but she firmly held control of the corporate directorate.
Danieru was surprised that Nemu would express such obviously private information with a stranger such as him and when he expressed this she replied kindly:"But you're my daughter now; we don't keep secrets in my family."

Darieru was taken aback at the simple statement. To be referred to as someone's child almost succumbed the 16-year old orphan. But he was also confused, didn't she mean son? But he dismissed this as just another one of the language barrier mishaps between them.

He further learned that Nemu had 2 daughters: Nami( aged 13) and Suki(aged 15). He would be meeting them at Nemu's home , where they eagerly awaited to meet him.
111211.title: During the ride to Nemu's house.

choices: Danieru becomes aware of changes during the night.
Danieru becomes aware of changes when he wakes up in the morning.
1112111.content:
Holy shaait!

Danieru wondered whether it was ingrown to the Japanese to be modest when bragging about their possessions, because he could all but help himself from gaping and letting his lower jaw slide across the floor.

When they had driven to Nemu's neighbourhood he had noticed that the suburb they had gone into, unquestionably belonged to the upper classes. The houses became larger, the lawns wider, the cars parked before them increased from the 6-figure to the 7-figure category. It must have been the Japanese equivalent of Beverly Hills! And on the pinnacle of this prestigious area, on the very top of the hill on which this neighbourhood lay, like the cherry sitting grandly on top of the cake, was Nemu's "house".

But that wasn't a house, let me tell ya! Danieru had seen houses and lived them. This wasn't a house. It was a bloody fully-fledged mansion!! The likes of which would put the American President's private residence to total shame. It must have had a 15 acre garden surrounding it! Like those you see surrounding 5-star hotels and royal palaces.
It was a fashionable blend of modern architecture and traditional Japanese exterior design. Danieru could see dragons on the roof acting as gargoyles and golden paper-wicker walls on one side. It had no less than 10 garage entrances. 10!!!

Nemu commented casually that she hoped her home would be alright for Danieru. He nearly fainted and expressed what utter paradise her estate was in comparison to his rundown apartment back in the states. Horrified at Danieru's previous living quarters she promised that he could have the largest room in her mansion and that during his stay with her, she would make his life as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Nemu again told him that should he desire anything, anything at all, she would get him it.

Danieru didn't doubt her sincerity, and now most certainly didn't doubt her capacity; for it would appear that she had the wealth to buy whatever his imagination could conjure up a hundred times over and still not blink.
But he had his pride: he would refuse to ask anything of her that he didn't need. He would not abuse his position to ask expensive gifts of her. He was already grateful that she had treated him kindly thus far.
He was however understandably excited about the privilege to live inside a mansion for a whole month!

At the main hall entrance, no less than 20 servants greeted Nemu and Danieru; gardeners, maids and security perssonel. Nemu introduced them to him and him to them, all names going in through one ear and out the other, and said they would cater for his every need. All of them were understandably curious about meeting a westerner for the first time, even though most of them could hardly speak a single word of English. And Danieru in turn could only stare at having so many people dressed so posh assigned to him. This truly was amazing to the orphan whom raised himself in poverty.

Next came Danieru's new foster sisters: Nami(aged 13) and Suki (aged 15) were both younger clones of Nemu. Both have inherited their mothers beauty and kindness. And like their mother, through thick accents, could still speak clear, concise English -product of private schooling. Showing the same interest as their mother in Danieru they assaulted him with questions about his homeland and life as an American. At first Danieru was shy, but their enthusiasm quickly ensured that they got along quite well.

Excusing herself, Nemu told the girls to show you to your room, for she had a few very important phone calls to make about the family company. Excitement upwelling, they towed him all the way to his new room. And what a splendid one it was. Like a genuine 5-star hotel room. Only except his bed lay directly on the floor, there were rifled mats and silk curtains and the door was a wicker-paper sideways sliding one, all courtesy of Japanese culture. Danieru thought for the first time that he may actually win that stupid UN-culture diversity report thing; it didn't get more awesome than this. The only thing off, was that his room seemed almost eneffiminate, as if meant for a girl. The colour pink was prominent.

The only thing that kept bugging him was that Nami and Suki kept referring to him as their new "sister". Believing them to mistranslate the word, he tried to correct them: "Girls are sisters; boys are brothers." he said.
But they just exhanged worried frowns:"You don't want to be our sister then?" Nami asked hesitantly.
Fearing he might have offended them and that they had not understood he only meant this to correct their language, he relented to them calling him their sister. What did it matter what they called him anyway? To be referred to as a sibling for the 1st time in his life as an orphan, was heartwarming to him.

He learned much from Suki and Nami in a short time. That they were just like any normal American girls were. They listened to pop groups, they loved shopping, they loved dressing up, went to school. There were the obvious eccentricities that separated them from westerners, but they were in effect not dissimilar. He quickly got on good ground with them discussing anime ( Japanese cartoon animation), and talked about many shows and series they had watched. This was Japan after all, the country in which anime and manga had originated in.

He also learned a great deal about cosplay from them. Cosplay is the re-enactment and dressing up as fictional characters, be they from novels, comics or most traditionally anime. Although in technicality dressing up as superman or spiderman qualifies as cosplay, since it includes the replication of fictional chracters, it was generally accepted that true cosplay, i.e. hardcore cosplay, involved the role playing of Eastern animated chracters or even characters from JRPG's.

Danieru wanted to laugh when Nami and Suki told him they practised cosplay for hobbies. They dressed up as fictional characters in their free time? He thought that ridiculous. However he soon found that cosplay was considered a serious passtime by the Japanese ,since it included a great many conventions held for it throughout the year. Cosplayers also significantly influenced street culture
and participents of competitions could win great prizes for the excellence of their attire and win fame throughout the internet for it.
Cosplay was a trend that had captured the youth of Japan.

A great deal of cosplay also centered around the creation of the character's outfits along with wearing it. Monumental effort was invested in the creation of these attires which was traditionally made from scratch using domestic tools and supplies. These weren't some half-assed outfits swabbed together at the last moment like those at Halloween. Oh no, serious effort sometimes involving weeks to months of stitching and sowing was applied.
Nami and Suki took great pride in showing off their many suits which they had created over the course of many years worth of cosplay to Danieru. They were nothing short of magnificent. Clearly the girls were talented. Neko's, dresses, anthro's, and various outfits way out and awesome lined a room dedicated them. A cabinet containing the winnings of multiple competitions lined a wall.

Nami and Suki offered to help Danieru create his own cosplay outfit during the holiday, and expressed with excitement that a famous cosplay-convention would be held nearby this weekend. They told him that although he wouldn't have enough time to create a respectable suit for himself, he was welcome to wear any of the costumes they had created.
Danieru gave them a funny look and declined, saying he'd rather not since everything in the room was girls clothes.
This earned him funny looks in return from Nami and Suki, but he attributed this to cosplay involving crossdressing as a norm.

A maid came by interrupting their conversations, and stated that it was time for dinner. The dining room was simple considering the enormity of the mansion, a flat table to the ground, with cushions for chairs around it; the Japs ate sitting on the ground, usually on their knees. At the table Danieru saw something which made him laugh outright.
There were 4 seats with 4 pieces of crockery and chopsticks placed to each. A simple yet eloquent meal of noodles and ramen in a great cooking pot took the center. The source of mirth?: a McDonald's meal placed to the side on a hot-plate of one seat.

The cook smiled and explained that he feared Danieru might not find his own humble cooking to his western tastes and had taken precautions to obtain food of American culture. Danieru could freely choose which he wanted to eat if not both.
Danieru could only laugh: American culture? If this was what the Japs thought then it only served to proved Americans had no culture whatsoever.
Danieru asked the cook what the knife and fork was for; the cook replied that he was curious as to how they were utilised for eating, he'd never seen a westerner eat. He wanted to teach Danieru to eat with chopsticks and have Danieru teach him to use a knive and fork; Danieru chuckled and said he would do so gladly.

Nemu had rejoined Danieru and the girls and the evening went on splendidly. Danieru had manage to eat everything on the table, single handedly cleaning out the ramen and noodle pot AND the McDonalds meal: it wasn't everyday Danieru could eat his fill, poverty prevented that. He thanked the cook for his cooking, whom bowed glowing in pleasure and pride.

He failed to notice that Nemu had watched him eat with the utmost attention. Eyes following every piece he had swallowed.
Suddenly Danieru felt as if exhaustion had overtaken him, his eyelids faltered and his lips slurred.
He couldn't understand why he was tired; as if he had run a marathon.

He asked if he could be excused to sleep. Nemu took him by the hand to his room.
There she took him by the face and asked him if he would be happy to be her daughter for the next month, for she would be grateful.
Already drugged, he could only say yes before collapsing.
1112111.title: They arrived at Nemu's home in time for din...

11121111.content:
Danieru was in a coma. It was like trying to wake from a decade long hibernation, sleep refusing to let go of him.
The something slid across his face, first the crown of his head, then his cheek, then his chin. He woke up with a start believing an insect was crawling over his face.

Putting on his room-light,he looked at himself in the cabinet mirror,and felt himself over. He sighed in relieve as he realised it was only his hair rubbing him. He surveyed his surroundings, realising he was back in his pink colour-schemed room. He wondered how he'd gotten there? Everything past dinner was a haze to his memory. Then his attention was reverted back to his hair which had woken him.

Wait what??? How'd his hair become this long? It hanged beyond his neck! Danieru's hair had never been longer than a buzz-cut. What the hell? Bewildered he rubbed his chest and suddenly became aware of an unknown sensitivity there.
It was on his chest, yet not on it, but in it. He pulled his shirt up and got a shock.

Areolas the size of 4-centimeter washers occupied the space where mere pecks had been before, his nipples jutted outward prominently like screws from their centers. Fatty sacks lay behind them. He had the chest of a growing pubescent 10-year old girl.
Astonished he cupped one, it being so small it only filled the cavity of his palm; they were without question the source of sensitivity.
Danieru had no idea what was going on; was he going insane?

Perturbed he noticed other things. The hair on his forearms were all but gone, the remainder fell off like autumn leaves at touch.
Looking further at his hand, he couldn't decide whether they were more slender than before or not; but his fingernails were certainly longer by a good 5 millimeters than the night before. The shit? He'd cut his fingernails 2 nights before to be presentable, it should take 2 weeks to grow that fast!

Inspecting his legs revealed the same. Amazed he saw that his calves were thinner and that he had a hint of a waistline beneath his upturned shirt. Course he didn't even know it was a waistline. He ignorantly assumed he was starved.
Adding to his irritability his lips felt swollen and his throat ached.
His reflection was peculiar: he looked andrognous; his face eneffimanite. He could put on a flower dress and none would notice.

All of this was inconsequential to Danieru whom was most deeply disturbed by the significant reduction in his size and length: the room felt bigger, the ceiling and doorframe higher; his shirt sleeve just reached his elbows and short-rims reached passed his knees.
Danieru was terrified that he was shrinking more than anything else!

Confused, uncertain, scared, Danieru didn't know what was happening. His heart pumped away blood at lightspeed and adrenaline from fear filled his veins. Combined, these 2 factors served to accelerate the drug that was causing his transformation exponetially.
Things then happened fast. Very fast.

Danieru could hear his bones crack as his skeleton dislodged, reformed, grew at some places, shrunk at others and moved around inside of him.
His spinal chord started snapping backwards, vertebrae by vertebrae, each snap louder and fiercer, as if some sadistic pianist were playing lower to higher notes using his spine. With each snapping of vertebrae, his spine ached more and more backwards, until he was bended almost 90 degrees backwards in a very uncomfortable gymnastic position.
Release only came when the last vertebrae snapped into place, Danieru gasping in pain.

Intense pressure alerted him to his hands, where he could see his stumpy fingers slenderize into dainty twigs. The fingernails felt as if they were being pulled out and grew to a sizable centimeter. The same story with his feet, which shrunk from a size 10 to a size 8.

Meanwhile the rest of his skeleton was on fire: his bones felt like being hammered by a smithy. His pelvis opened outwards, as if pulled by 2 opposing tug-of-war teams, to form wider hips. His femurs(upper legs) followed suit and were moved outward to accomodate the pelvis at the hips, whilst the knees moved inwards. His shoulders felt as if squeezed by a giant hand; smoothing them over. The remainder of his bones shrank to reform to his new female skeleton, and all popped back into place with a large crunch which sent Danieru yelping.

His yelping had sounded funny but he paid no heed to his voice. His chest was heaving from fright and pain; tears streamed down his face.
Finding power to lift his head to the mirror, he saw he had shrunk even farther than before. His shirt sleeves now reached well past his elbows and his shorts-rims past his knees. He could see his hair had grown in the meantime, and already reached the small of his back. His vision was slightly obscured as the chaotic hair growth had passed his face.
As he tried to pull them from his eyes, he felt his hair changing.Looking he saw it darkening, becoming black,sleek,silky; very dissimilar from his original curly brown head.

Danieru wanted to pass out, but the pain afterglow from his skeletal re-arrangement held him conscious in an iron grip. Even now he had no idea what was happening with him. Although half an hour had already passed, it felt like mere minutes. The silence was punctuated by Danieru's sharp intakes of breath and quiet crying.

Then a second wave of changes barraged him.
Danieru could literally feel the strengh leaving him as the muscles in his arms, legs and neck shrank, withering away to attach their collective masses elsewhere. His mid-riff pinched as it slackened to a to-die-for waistline.

He felt fat and flesh re-attach themselves to his upper arms and outer thighs. He could then feel himself rising an inch as his bottom expanded like an inflatable cushion being blown up, as he was sitting on his rump after all this trauma.
He remembered feeling foolish for thinking for about a split-second how comfortable and nice it felt to now sit on his soft, bubbled and rounded rear-end.

Then, without warning his entire exterior, his skin and face in particular, started to grow hot and felt flowing, like candle wax being remolded. He felt like being strangled for a few brief seconds as his adam's apple was pulled into his throat; his earlier ached subsiding. Next his lips, having felt swollen earlier, inflated to become puffy and pouted.

At this point in time Danieru suspected what was going on, even though he didn't grasp how or why it was happening. That he was changing into a girl was all he knew.

Danieru then noticed the pigmentation of his white caucasian skin altering, darkening, becoming smooth alabaster. It darkened past hispanic and into asian skin-tones. Along came an increase of his skins sensitivity, becoming 3fold more sensitive to the touch. His skin became so sensitive that his own male clothes started to feel like coarse grain sacks.

The changes to his face also started to become more prominent. His jawline slackened and cheeks rounded. His face generally softened and became feminine. His eyelashes grew and eyebrows became thin and slender feathers. His handsome roman nose regressed to become a cute button snout.
Finally his eyes became Epicanthic slant asian-eyes (teardrops with the tails stretched away from the nose), and his irisses turned from crystal blue to a lovely black-brown.

The heat faded from his skin and face, but started to concentrate around his nether regions and chest. Danieru didn't even need to guess, he knew what was about to happen.

Like holding 2 waterballoons whilst they filled with water, he could sense the unmistakable sensation of growing breasts. Mass collected behind his nipples, pushing them outward. Slowly they expanded, ever larger and larger. They were still small, lesser than developing pubescent girls, but to the horrified Danieru they appeared to be collassal tomahawk-cruise missles being ejected from their pods as they slowy tugged outward against his shirt. His erect nipples showing through the fabric.

But the hapless Danieru couldn't even watch this in dignity as he was suddenly overcome by pain equivalent to having a demented psycopath trying to ram his manhood back into his crotch using a sledgehammer. Then blessed relief.
The mortified Danieru hesitantly lifted his pants to inspect the aftermath.

He saw how in mere seconds his testis were absorbed by his flesh, followed by his now miniscule member.
The pain was dulled, but his insides churned as if someone had thrown in a whole caseload of spanners into whatever made him tick in his intestines. He watched in fascinated horror as his testis conformed to grow ovaries sideways from his new womb, how his penis inverted completely to become the emptyness of womanhood, and how the skin of his scrotum regressed to create the folds of his labia and the outward lips of his new.....he didn't want to say or even think about it, but there undesputably was a fully-fledged vagina sitting between his legs. He closed his pants immediately, feeling green in the face.
11121111.title: The moment you've all been waiting for.

choices: Danieru panics in front of Nemu.
111211111.content:
As if on cue, he heard his shirt tear. Crap. To say that he was a healthy girl was a bit of an understatement. His generously endowed and ample bosom could hardly be contained by his shirt. The pert orbs of flesh on his chest were enormous, yet they still kept growing until they ripped his shirt in half, right down the neck, exposing some serious cleavage. Finally they stopped. Danieru of course would not know, but he was the proud owner of an E-cup sized bust. He didn't have the courage to touch them, he just stared at his own impressive rack in awe.

Finally the transformation was complete.
Before Danieru sat a spectacularly beautiful and cute Eurasian (European-Asian hybrid) teenage girl. She appeared to have cried recently, tear-trails still fresh on her face. She looked confused and scared. Most notably she was dressed in frumpy, baggy clothing far too large for her; It fit he badly, her breasts seemingly having torn through her flat shirt, showing all.
She had lovely long black silky hair running down her back all the way past he bottom. It was likely if it received some combing, then her chaotic hair would be even more lovely so.

The girl perfectly replicated and mimicked Danieru's each and every movement. His logic told him that he was staring at his own reflection, yet he could not believe his eyes.
He was in total, utter, complete shock and just stared for what seemed like an eternity.

Noise from the door turned his head and he saw Nemu walking towards him with concern and excitement.
She asked him something, but Danieru could but stare.
111211111.title: Continue (Ran out of space)

choices: He disagrees, until a condition is met.
1112111112.content:
Understandably shocked by his spontaneous gender flip and distraught by the excruciating pain from his ordeal, Danieru was pushed over the edge of panic when he saw Nemu enter his room. He had a funny look in her face, as she advanced on him.

Danieru's soft, pretty face, aside from the obvious it showing his asian heritage, was a queer blend of his own original face and this new collection of feminine features. He could see himself somewhat in this Eurasian girl's face, but his mother, if he had had one, would literally not have recognized him. He was deathly afraid that Nemu would also not recognize him, and throw him out as a trespassing stranger.

His honey-sweet high voice rang out trembling, tears starting to swell: "P-please..... you have to believe me. I-it's me...its Danieru. I don't know what happened. Please just, its Danieru!" He need not have worried, for Nemu's next action took him by surprise.

Nemu sat down next to Danieru on the floor and hugged him tightly: "Oh you! You've turned out so well!" Danieru was taken aback, the unexpected hug sqeezing his new chest pillows against Nemu's, bringing alien sensations.

"W-what..? Did you hear what I said? I'm Danieru." he said in confusion.
"Yes, yes, dear. I know. Its alright."
"But...I'm...You...I don't know what's...going on...I..." With that Danieru choked and finally succumbed to sobbing.
"Shuss, its O.K. , Its O.K Just shuss." she said rubbing the weeping Danieru on his lithe back. She then picked him up by his now newly flabby upper-arms and carried him over to his low-lying bed.
There she sat and hugged the understandably distressed Danieru tightly again whist whispering quiet comforting words: "There, there, just cry your heart out. Its going to be all better." Several minutes in Nemu's embrace brought a quiet calm to Danieru, and even after he stopped crying he just sat there breathing, hugging Nemu back.

Eventually he found his now melodious voice again: "How do you know I'm Danieru? I'm a girl now." he added as if the fact had not yet been established.
Nemu smiled a: "Yes, and you're very pretty, dear."

"But I'm not a girl." he stupidly contradicted himself, confusion still in plentiful supply.
"No, I'd say otherwise."
"But I'm not a girl." he repeated stubbornly, like a 10-year old refusing to confinced of the inexistence of a fairy-tail character.
Without warning and to Danieru's horror, Nemu pulled open his oversized shorts: "Well, what's that then." she said like schoolmaster truimphatly having proven the correctness of an answer.

Danieru jumped back, mortified and indignant, clutching his crotch protectively: "I'm not supposed to be a girl!" he shouted. "How are you so calm, what...how did you know it was me?"
"Because I turned you into a girl." Nemu replied happily, callously.
Danieru almost speechless: "You did..."
"Yes!" she said eagerly.
Now outraged and angry: "What? How...Why would you do this to me?" the question came out like an accusatory whiplash, but in his high voice it sounded like squeak.

"But...didn't you say you wanted to be by daughter?" asked Nemu hurt. "I asked you many times yesterday whether you'd be happy to be my foster-daughter, last night as well. I thought you'd be okay with it. Even Nami and Suki said you sounded very happy to be their sister." Danieru remembered the numerous occasions he had heard Nemu referring to him as her daughter, how he had responded to it thinking that it was a mere translation error on Nemu's and Suki's and Nami's behalf. He certainly hadn't thought it would be a foreshadowing of his foster-relation to them in terms of his sex.

"But...but I didn't think you meant that literally!" he shouted. "This...this is cruel. I didn't asked for this..." he sagged, tearglands heating up again.
"Please." said Nemu, concern and worry on her face: "Just let me explain." She held his hand, which stopped him.
He looked at her tiredly, mistrustingly and relented: "Fine."

Nemu proceeded to explain that her pharmaticules company which they had talked about earlier in the ride to her house, was busy with the creation of drugs and medicine, the likes of which would break the bounds of medical-science and win multiple Nobel-prizes over. But the drugs they were busy making were top-secret, for they did not desire fame or fortune, but only the preservation of all species of life the earth. She went on saying that the drug they had created, had advanced agricultural and ecological applications.

Many shady multi-billion agricultural corporations had hired the services of Nemu's world-class medicine company to create a drug that would allow farmers to basically spontaniously flip the genders of their breeding life-stock at will. The idea was that farmers would be able to balance out the amount of females and males within their stock within the breeding season, so that within desperate times where there were an imbalance within the appropraite genders of a specific life-stock, their genders could be flipped saving said farm from bankruptcy and increase the litters from what would have been originally fewer, significantly. Such a drug would bring fortunes to to the inventor which would dwarf the treasures of even Bill Gate's himself.

This drug, which Nemu explained, they had so far almost perfected, altered the genetic make-up of organism at cellular level, meaning that animals would become one of the opposite sex from within their very DNA as well. The drug strangely only affected mammals, all others animal kingdoms were completely unaffected. This drug, which Nemu called the TG-drug (just shut up you at the back of the audience, I couldn't think of anything better, and it's past 2am), would be the greatest leap into Genetically modified agricultural foods by technology as of yet.

But, Nemu went on, as if trying to defend herself and her company's honor. They weren't making the TG-drug for the sake of monetary gain; they wanted to save the red-listed mammals on earth, whom were exceedingly close to extinction from poaching and other factors such as humans destroying their natural habitats. Many animals, such as rhino's, the tigers and many more, were being held in captivity in zoo's around the globe. Yet despite the zoo-keepers best efforts of making the environment for these endangerourd species as optimal as possible for them to breed and repopulate, they were dying out because of a lack of availiable males or females in many cases. The TG-drug would solve this serious problem.
Nemu's company could only achieve this creation with the financing of these corporate-syndecates.

Danieru couldn't decide whom was more deranged. Himself or Nemu. He was still in deep shock (seriously comrades, being gender bended unexpectedly and against your will must be a harrowing experience) and wasn't entirely sure whether he was awake or sane anymore. Nemu's fantastic tale sounded so surreal he just couldn't bear himself to believe it. And yet every breath he took jiggled his new breasts convincing him more and more that maybe that this was not a nightmare but an appalling reality.

"What does this have to do with me?" he asked after a while.

Nemu explained that the drug was incomplete, that they couldn't stabilize its chemical reactions. They had needed the genetic make-up of human-beings, because the human genetic-structure consisted of exactly 23 pairs of chromosome which was for some unexplainable reason the perfect middle-ground from which to subsist the drug on, and which would affect all other organisms. They had tested the drug on human stem-cells, all of which showed perfect gender flips. Now they had just needed a complete live human subject for their experimentation.

Danieru was flabbergasted: "You mean...you tricked me. That all I was, was a lab-rat?!"
"Oh no!" replied Nemu horrified that he should draw such a dreadful conclusion: "You were still planned to be my foster daughter for the month,only so you could be studied. And I'm still going to make your stay here as happy as possible."

"You...You're monsters!" cried Danieru angry: "You mean to tell me you planned to...to do whatever you did to me with whomever random sod had showed up to be your foster child; that has got to be against the rights convention or something!"

Nemu looked unhappy at his outburst: "No. We didn't just take a random child. We took you especially because you are an orphan. That way you wouldn't be missed after no communications to back home."
Danieru was dumbfounded: "How could you know that...?"
"The UN-program. We inspected all applying children. You were perfect."
For the second time that night Danieru was rendered speechless.

Nemu was sincerely concerned at Danieru's silence, and tried to gently talk to him: "I'll treat you well. The girls will show you around and we'll have a good time. You can go anywhere and I'll buy you anything you want. Just you see, It'll be exactly as if you had come here for the month. I'm only asking that you be my daughter."

"It hurt." said Danieru out of the blue. "That hurt a bloody lot. It was painful!! I could feel my skin melting."
"Yes, my fault entirely. You have every right to be angry. I had planned to inject you with painkillers before the morphing-stage, but you changed 3 hours early. You'd eaten the whole ramen-castrol; you had quite an appetite; you accidentally overdosed yourself and you transformed earlier than predicted.
Because of thathe drug...uhm, also made you a bit more healthy that I had expected and intended. Although not a bad thing, I'd say." she said happily prodding Danieru's volumous breasts.
Danieru crossed his arms red-faced, hiding his blossoming bosom, which stood from his torn shirt.
"I don't want to be a girl" he moaned.
"Please, Danieru." Nemu took both his hands in hers "I'm imploring you. This experiment is vital. I promise I'll have you have a great time."
"I need some time."
Nemu stood up and left without a word, leaving him.
1112111112.title: Danieru panics in front of Nemu.

choices: I am pretty tired, could you please spend the time with me, Mum?
I need to go the bathroom, Mum. I love you!
11121111122.content:
''I'm a girl in a foreign country with no id! My new family....I don't understand why they wouldn't tell first!'' A knock on the door startled Danieru. <Hello? Danieru, are you dressed? Could I come in, please?> You had no idea what the new girl was saying. ''I can't speak Japanese!'' Danieru explained.

''Oh, ok! Are you dressed? Could I please be allowed to come in?'' asked the girl. ''Give me a minute, please.'' Dani answered, confused. Danieru looked around before realising that Nemu had brought him a Japanese schoolgirl outfit. Suppressing her disgust, he put on the outfit. She had to bite back a moan, when the panties snugly pressed themselves against Dani's skin.

''Ok, you can come in.'' he offered, hating how shrill she sounded. The girl entered; a smile on her face. She was a tiny girl; Dani doubted she was more than 5 feet tall. What Dani couldn't get over was the size of her chest. It was disproportionate for a girl so tiny. ''Hey, girlie, my face is up here!'' pointed out the new girl.

''Oh...sorry... I didn't mean to!'' stammered Dani, cursing himself for her stupidity at staring at another girl's chest. She suddenly feeling queasy when he realised that she thought the phrase 'another girls' chest'! ''She!'' stated the new girl. Dani stared at her, confused. ''You should start thinking of yourself as a she. It will make the periods seems less frightening, though they still feel excruciating! I cried my eyes out when I had my first!'' she revealed. Dani found she couldn't speak. She hadn't even thought of periods.

''Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Akiko Jane Koizumi, lesbian granddaughter of Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi. I take it Dani that becoming a girl is freaking you out, a lot?'' she asked. Dani stared at her, unable to conceive of a word to utter. How did she know? ''You might have noticed that despite being 19, I have a very large engagement ring on my left hand. Perhaps you could let me explain that?'' she suggested.

Dani noticed the large ring and stupidly exclaimed ''You're like arranged or something?'' Akiko burst with laughter at that. Dani didn't feel like laughing, but she smiled nevertheless. It's quite a silly thing to say. ''Pretty sure that nobody would make that arrangement for me! After all, I'm not the one promised to the football star, am I Danieru?'' Dani’s new eyes widened and she squealed at the comment. Akiko laughed at that. ''Sorry, I'm being a bitch! You should see your face, though! Hahaha! As if your new family would arrange a marriage for you! It's not shogun times, you know! I mean there are no more samurai or shoguns in Japan then there are cowboys or shootouts at the corral, back home!'' she pointed out.

''You're American!'' Dani realised. ''Dual citizen and it's complicated. But I am engaged though to a woman!'' she answered. ''So I'm definitely not arranged!'' Dani sought clarification. The thought of marrying a man, made her sick. ''In Japan, they don't do that! In fact, I'm pretty sure that other than in the Middle East and certain parts of the Indian subcontinent, nobody does that! Like I said I'm Akiko and here is a picture of me and my fiancée back when we were 16.'' she replied, handing her a photo.

Dani looked at the odd girl, before turning her gaze to the photo. ''This photo is a guy with some Asian girl!'' he pointed out. ''Yep, that's me with my Chinese-American girlfriend, now fiancée.'' Akiko agreed. Dani gasped when she realised what Akiko was saying. ''You're a guy!'' she squealed. Akiko shook her head. ''I’m a guy only in the legal sense. This allows me to marry Samantha Cheung, my fiancée. The Japanese tabloids made a big deal about it. It's not every day an ex-Japanese PM's illegitimate son has a daughter who is marrying the daughter of a wealthy Chinese industrialist! I can tell you this, they wouldn’t leave us alone! Although technically my future father-in-law is a triple citizen as he held dual British-American citizenship at the time of Hong Kong's handover.'' clarified Akiko.

''So you... But you're a white guy! Or you were... Or...'' ''Your mother gave you Echange, the wonder drug that gender bent you into a Eurasian hybrid. My girlfriend tricked me into taking Pouvoir, a permanent strain of the basic formula Nouveau. Pouvoir altered me into a Japanese girl. Pouvoir is permanent and I can't go back. Echange is temporary.'' she answered. ''Why don't they use Pouvoir then on cattle and endangered animals?'' Dani cried.

''Pouvoir is too potent. It kills them! And Nouveau only works on primates. I am not entirely sure how they turned my dad in Grandpa Junichiro's son...but he went from orphaned white guy mechanic to member of the Diet! Not bad for an illegitimate man with a lesbian daughter!'' she remarked. ''But they know it works, so why test it on me?'' Dani squealed. ''Nemu wants a successor. Her daughters don't want to, but her successor would need to do everything needed to save the company, a clever orphan would do that!'' she explained.

''But...'' ''Nemu went through a hundred orphans' profiles to help her, but she kept come back to you! You, Danieru, were the one she believed she would love. I warned her you would be upset, but she had little choice. These corporations are bad people, Danieru! They are greedy and cruel! They would use the drug not just on animals, but to threaten government officials, erase whistleblowers, all sorts of thing. One of them has a rude daughter called Rei. Rei Aso is yuri, so for Nemu to get her help, she needs to find the right kind of girl for her. Yuri is the Japanese word for girl loving. Maybe a girl who has the mind of a boy? Nemu cares about you deeply, Danieru. And though she was wrong to deceive you, she was badly hurt by your comments. You have been given the chance at a new life, Danieru. It comes at the cost of periods and your manhood! But you are the heir to all this and if you play your cards right, a sexy new girlfriend! I mean your profile indicated no experience with girls!'' she pointed out.

''I didn’t understand!'' exclaimed Dani. ''Rei Aso is a bigger all girl than Navratilova. She has been with at least 12 girls. But her father wants her to get married one day. As you are biologically female, but legally male, you can do that! Equally your gametes still carry sperm, so like me; you can be both a father and mother! Of course, I will be a father!'' Akiko clarifies. ''I don't want to be a mother!'' Dani stated.

''If you get a girlfriend and a promise from Nemu to accept you as a yuri girl, will you agree to do this for a month?'' asked Akiko. ''Akiko, why are you doing this for Nemu and my sisters?'' enquired Dani, before realising she just said my sisters. ''Samantha's Dad Deng is one of the partners of Nemu. As his future son-in-law, its’ my job to protect the family's interests! Also I feel I should help a fellow TG victim!'' replied Akiko.

''Akiko....is that you original name?'' she asked. Akiko smirked, shaking her head. ''Jacob Barnes is my original name. But I took a new name when I became the biological granddaughter of Grandpa Junichiro! It would be weird for a Japanese girl to be called Jake!'' Danieru nodded, giggling despite herself. ''Seriously Nemu is really upset. And your sisters as you call them; think you volunteered your manhood because you care about them so much. So please forgive and apologise to Nemu. And don't tell your sisters that you were tricked.'' suggested Akiko.

"If I agree to this which includes the accepting me as a lesbian, I have a condition that must be met! I can go back, if it's not working out!" responded Danieru. "I accept your condition, Danieru! I am very pleased to have you as my daughter!" declared Nemu, running through the door to hug Danieru. Tears fell down Dani's eyes as she responded "I'm sorry I was so upset, Mum! Please forgive me!" "It is I who needs your forgiveness, my beloved daughter! You do not need to offer me any apologies, Danieru! To me, you are my angel daughter!" "You too don't need my forgiveness, but it’s yours if you want it, Mum!" replied Danieru. "That is twice you have called me Mum! I am so glad to hear it! Thank you Misu Koizumi!" Nemu thanked Akiko. "It was my pleasure, Nemu! And please call me Akiko!" responded Akiko. Nemu and Dani thanked Akiko as she left. "Well my daughter, what do you wish for now?" offered Nemu, lovingly.
11121111122.title: He disagrees, until a condition is met.

choices: You will be turned into a yōkai girl.
You will be turned into a cyborg girl
You will be turned into a normal girl
11122.content:
As the woman drives you think. The exchange program was like most exchange programs. The purpose was to teach participants about foreign cultures, improve language skills, etc. Most went to Europe, but you had signed up to go to Japan. A Japanese family had offered to host you while you were here. You were scheduled to stay for a full year.

Eventually, the car pulls to a stop in front of a large house on the outskirts of the city. Two people are waiting as you pull in, a man and a woman, (obviously) both Japanese. The man has neatly combed black hair and is wearing a black suit. The woman has black hair in a long braid and is wearing a simple shirt and skirt, both dark gray. You and the woman who drove you get out of the car.

"Greetings, Daniel Johnson," the man says. His accent is much thinner than the woman who met you. "I am Kurosawa Hiroto – or Hiroto Kurosawa in the Western order." He gestures at the woman beside him. "This is my wife, Mayu." He now gestures at the woman who met you. "And this is my sister, Hitomi. We will be hosting you for the duration of your stay."

"Welcome to Japan, Daniel-san," Mayu says.

"Thank you," you say. After a second, you bow - you'd read it's polite here. All three reciprocate, Mayu smiling pleasantly.

"If you'll follow me, Daniel-san," Mayu says, "I'll show you around the house. Hitomi, please take his luggage to his room."

"Hai," Hitomi says, nodding. She retrieves your suitcases from the car, lifting them with surprising ease, and heads into the house.

Mayu gestures, and you follow her. As she said, she shows you around. She starts by taking you to the garden in the back. "The Kurosawas are an old, wealthy family," she says as you walk through the fancy gardens, explaining the size of the house.

She then takes you back out front and inside. She and you both remove your shoes at the door. She shows you the entry hall, the kitchen and dining room, the living room, a small library, the bathrooms, and a study. She then takes you upstairs and points out the master bedroom (for Hiroto and herself), Hitomi's bedroom, and two guest rooms, one of which will be yours while you are living here.

Your bedroom is high quality and nice. There's a Japanese-style bed, a desk, and a closet. A flatscreen TV sits on a TV stand. There is a sliding door leading to a small balcony. Your suitcases are neatly laid out against one wall.

You turn to Mayu. "Um... thank you for having me," you say.

"Our pleasure," Mayu says. "I'll leave you to unpack. If you need anything, you can ask me or Hitomi or Hiroto."

"Thank you," you say again, and Mayu smiles, then leaves you alone.

You start unpacking, thinking that your time here in Japan will be both interesting and exciting. You don't know it, but you're certainly right.

Option 1: The Kurosawas are disguised yōkai, and they turn you into a female yōkai after you accidentally see them in their true forms.
Option 2: You will be turned into a melee-combat capable cyborg, visually indistinguishable from a teenage Japanese girl.
Option 3: You will end up transformed into a normal, intelligent, teenage Japanese girl.
11122.title: Arrival

choices: You will become a kitsune like Hiroto and Hitomi.
You will become a yuki-onna like Mayu.
You will become a different type of yōkai.
111221.content:
It happens about a week after you arrive, late at night. You don't remember the event very clearly, and it almost feels like a dream. What you do remember is... strange.

You're wandering around the house late at night. You don't remember why. You open a door downstairs (to the study, you think), and you see your hosts. But they look different. Hiroto and Hitomi both have fox ears on the top of their heads and three long fox tails, as well as gold eyes. Both are dressed casually. Both have longer hair, with Hiroto's reaching his shoulders and Hitomi's reaching her waist. Mayu's skin is paler, her eyes are pale blue, her hair is out of its braid and reaches just past her waist, and she is wearing a light blue kimono.

Confused, you back away, but they turn to see you. The three of them wave their hands at you simultaneously and you collapse to the ground, suddenly half-asleep and unable to move. Through your grogginess, you hear them speak.

"I never expected him to catch us in our true forms," Hiroto says.

"What should we do?" Hitomi asks.

"We can't kill him. No way." Mayu says.

"I would never suggest it," Hitomi responds.

"We can make him like us," Hiroto says. The two women smile and nod.

That's all you remember before passing out completely.

The event sticks in your mind when you wake up. You look around and see that you're back in bed in the room you're using. "Did that happen?" you ask yourself aloud. The memory feels real and not-real at the same time.

"Danieru-san, breakfast!" calls Hitomi's accented voice a minute later.

You get up. "Must have been a dream," you say. You quickly get dressed, and head downstairs to the kitchen.

What you don't know is that the three of them have already placed their spell on you, and over time you will be transformed into a female yōkai. A yōkai like they are, humanoid and capable of taking a human disguise.
111221.title: You will be turned into a yōkai girl.

1113.content:
You look through the airport for a chauffeur with a sign with your name on it, but you don't see anyone. Scanning through the crowd, you look until you find a robot with a sign.
"Mist-ter John-son come he-ere beep!" it plinks at you. Though the bot is only a few feet tall, it lifts your luggage easily, and carries it to a car. However, there is no driver! It must be automatic! You climb in, and await the destination...
1113.title: It's a Robot!

choices: "Daniel... Danielle..." The cause of the argument.
As you get closer, she spares you a smile.
Looking for an excuse, you point to the house's name.
11132.content:
You admire the busy streets, and the brilliant neon, as you pass through the city. Though the robotic chauffeur is off-putting. He... It seems proficient at driving, moving smoothly through the traffic. It obeys all the traffic laws, as best you can understand them. As it drives it points out certain features as you pass them.

It's impossible not to be impressed, but you find it's way of pronouncing your name, a little slow.

Miss...-ter Johnson....

The emotionless voice, turns into a drone that you ignore as the journey continues. The driver does answer your sleepily asked questions, that you manage to get out. But the effects of Jet-lag, and your leaving party means your eyelids become heavier, as you leave the more brightly lit parts of town.

Even now, it's still impossible to confuse it as America. The architecture is just too different, the mountains are beautiful and unfamiliar. Resting your head against the cooling glass of the side window, you see the lights of the city forming a complex circuit of city streets as the car ascends away the mountain. Your forehead bumps and bounces softly against the glass, but not so badly that it keeps you awake.

- - - - -

A freezing gust wakes you with a start. A trickle of drool dribbling from the corner of your mouth ensures you create a terrible first impression.

"Johnson-san... Danieru Johnson...."

Still groggy you turn towards the human voice. It's a beautiful, young faced woman, her head just inside the door as she peers into the dull interior of the car. It takes two attempts to free the seat belt, and you smile awkwardly at her as you do.

"Yes... Yes,.. -er- Hai, I'm Daniel..ru-san... desu?"

Your foggy brain struggling with even the rough introduction you attempted before leaving. Getting out the car, your feet crunch in the snow. Your breath whorls around you as you exhale. A huge palatial house looms out of the darkness, and around you, trees block most of the view. Though, you can see spottily through the gaps that you are high in the mountains, and any dreams of Karaoke, and nights in Tokyo are evaporating.

Closing the door behind you, looking over the roof of the car, "And you are...?"

"I'm Suzuki, Natsuko Suzuki." She bobs politely as she beckons you towards the imposing mansion. You see another dark haired girl getting your luggage out the boot. You exchange smiles, but not words. You want to offer to help, but aren't sure of the ettiquette. Would it be wrong to offer to help? Would that suggest she was weak? It's all so different. Natsuko's feet crunch through the snow, and you decide to just give the girl a polite, brief nod before trailing after Natsuko.

By the large front door, you see a large wooden sign. The Japanese characters cut into the snow-capped wood.

途方もない女の子のための家

"The name of the house?" you ask.

Natsuko pauses a moment then agrees.

A stern looking woman stands in the doorway as you approach. You couldn't call her intimidating, she's half a head shorter than you. But you see Natsuko's whole manner become nervous and stiff. They have a rapid-fire, conversation, which includes her pointing at you. The speed is far beyond you, and you're afraid to interrupt. Natsuko bows repeatedly during the conversation, and even without speaking you know she's apologising or apologetic. You can't work out how she could possibly be to blame, but you aren't about to join in this conversation.

Eventually, the stern woman lets out a slow deep sigh. Her breath masking her face in a cloud of icy-white vapour, until she gestures Natsuko into the house.

With a curled finger, she summons you closer. Despite her size, her slim build, her age, you still feel unsettled. You spare a backwards glance to the car, and the girl there. Moral support? Explanation?

She give an unmistakable grunt of impatience, and you give an apologetic smile and step forward.
11132.title: ...A strange mansion in the hills

choices: One of the girls walks through the milling crowd to you and Miss Kibishii.
For a distraction, you look for the girl with your luggage.
You take out your mobile, there's no reception and no wi-fi.
111321.content:
"I'm Miss Kibishii." Her hand comes out, and in a greeting you don't recognise, it explores your chest. A snarl again flashes her teeth, and she flips through the paperwork. You recognise your own handwriting, and your name at the top. The sight of the form brings back memories of painful headaches, and frustration. The damned thing was half in English (Badly translated at that), and the rest in Japanese.

She stabs a crimson nailed finger at one particular point on the first page, a tick box just beneath your name, address and other details.

女性

男性

You shrug, at her, hoping to show your ignorance, rather than your growing apathy and disinterest. As she starts to speak garbled English, her grip on English becoming worse the angrier she becomes. You repeat your shrug, and shake your head.

Suddenly it falls into place, and you work out the problem.

"Daniel is a male name. Er... errr... Women take Danielle, or Daniela."

You tower over this intimidating woman. But her shoulders slump, and she waves you inside. Behind you, the car leaves the long driveway behind, it's wheels crunching the fresh snow that's already wiping away any trace of it's passing.

As you step inside, you are greeted by a phalanx of students, lined up against each wall. There are four adults, teachers? at the end of the lines, holding the girls in place.

Distantly you recall that not all the exchanges were with families, some were with schools... specifically boarding schools. It looks like you've landed in one of those. As you look around, you try to spare a smile to anyone whose eye you catch. The place looks like it belongs in the Victorian era.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...

It's a world (certainly half-the-world) away from your own experience in America.

As you stand there, certain other things sink in. The age of the place, the chill of the stone, even with the large stone fireplace roaring in one wall. It doesn't look like it's changed to fit the modern age at all. No central heating, Hell, you aren't even sure about phones, though it must have electricity. But the thing that's on your mind, and shrieking for attention. The issue demanding addressing. It looks like a girls school, and you aren't a girl.

You had heard that Japanese society was more regimented, less accommodating to the individual, and that was clear on the each girl's face. Her hair done in the same style, a blank look on everyone's face, and every girl in... what has to be the school uniform. You nod and smile to some, but they aren't happy to be singled out for attention. You have to admit that you already find some of them very distracting, despite the dullness of their uniforms.

"Hello." you announce, as loudly as you dare without wishing to sound like you're shouting. You see a few scattering of smiles and understanding looks. However, over half haven't even understood a simple greeting in English. This is a level of immersion you hadn't expected to face.

"今日は Konnichi wa."

You try to pronounce it as best you can. Most of the rest seem to understand. However, you still have a few blank looks, and you have to wonder how badly you mangled the language.

Miss Kibishii's hand lands on your shoulder, and you obediently fall silent. She gives a short speech, where the only words you pick out are the Japanised version of your name, Danieru Jon-son-san.

At the end, the girls snap to attention before slinking away.
111321.title: "Daniel... Danielle..." The cause of th...

choices: You decide to take the bath, it's only polite after all.
You spot Sakura open the other wardrobe... her wardrobe?
You look around for your baggage, for a change of clothes.
1113211.content:
She gives a curt bow to Miss Kibishii, and a tight smile towards you.

"This is Tanaka Sakura, she'll show you to your room."

"今日は、お元気ですか。 Konnichi wa, o-genki desu ka?"

You give Sakura a bow, it feels like you're hammering a tent peg home with your forehead, as she's almost a foot shorter than you. As you straighten up, her look has softened somewhat, and she returns your greeting. A wave of homesickness sweeps over you, as you suddenly feel the distance.

Taking out your mobile, you want to send a brief text to say you've arrived. There are no bars, and no hint of Wi-Fi, which isn't a problem, as Miss Kibishii snatches it from your hands.

"Isolation is part of our program, a break from the modern world." Her tone is clipped, and you have to accept it.

"I just want to call my family to tell them I've arrived..." you say, "Can I use your phone... the land line?"

She babbles something impatiently in Japanese, but you make out "...ありません。 ...arimasen."

Seeing your confusion, "It's a big adjustment, I understand. However, we don't have a phone. Isolation is part of our regime." Her words are spoken as if explaining a simple point to a stupid child.

"If you write them a letter, once a week, a member of staff goes to the village, and she can post it." Miss Kibishii slips your mobile into her pocket ending that discussion.

You want to protest, but you're tired from the journey, confused, and clearly there's been some mistake made, and frankly you haven't got a signal, so with a low sigh, you let it go.

You don't want your start here to get any worse so you change the topic.

"Is the village nearby? I'd love to see it? What's it's name?"

"No, no visits for new arrivals." Turning towards Sakura, she doesn't have to say anything more. Sakura is eager to be away, with a gesture for you to follow, she leads you through the castle, and towards your bedroom.

The castle looks well maintained, and wonderfully old, but cold seeps from the walls.

You end up in a plain room, with two single beds, and two simple wardrobes. A lead-lined window, looks out over the snow-capped trees of the forest.

Sakura's hand pats one of the wardrobes, "これ, this is your... yours." she says in uncertain English.

Her nose wrinkles cutely, and she waves to a heavy oak panelled door.

"お風呂... sumim... sorry, Would you like a bath?"

Popping your head through the door, you take it in.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...

It's entirely in keeping with the style of the castle, and you sincerely hope the water is piping hot. Your muscles ache in anticipation, the long journey catching up with you.
1113211.title: One of the girls walks through the crowd.

choices: Opening the wardrobe in the morning, a startling discovery.
You try to have a quiet chat with Sakura from your bed.
11132111.content:
Sakura's nose crinkles, and you take your own sniff. After the 12 hour flight, and the long drive, your clothes smell ripe. The sweat stains in the armpits are wide and wet.

You mouth 'Sorry', to Sakura, who has already pulled out a thick woolly dressing gown for you. She tosses it the dressing screen, to allow you to change privately. It's oddly exhilarating to change with Sakura still in the room. You feel yourself stiffen at the thought, already imaging Sakura equally naked and sharing the room.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...

"Once you're in the bath, I can take your clothes." Sakura's words come out in a bit of a flurry. Obviously, she's rehearsed this in her head.

"Yes, they'll need to be cleaned." you confirm.

Pulling the dressing gown down, you're glad it's so warm as you wrap it around yourself, and knot the belt loosely. However, your growing 'excitement' is harder to disguise. The gown has large furry cuffs, that give it a more feminine look than you appreciated, and you hadn't spotted the soft satin lining either. It's clearly a woman's dressing gown, once more thoughts of Sakura naked intrude, and you wonder how recently she wore it.

Crossing your hands in front of your crotch feels like the best compromise. Stepping out from behind the screen.

"Thank you. どうも domo..." you say, as quickly and clearly as you can manage.

You don't want to appear rude, and not thank her. But equally, or more embarrassingly you don't want to give her a chance to notice your erection. Thankfully, she doesn't notice, or at least doesn't comment. As you dart through the bathroom door.

"I'll take your clothes." she repeats.

You give a nod to show you've heard her, but you concentrate on sliding the bolt across the bathroom door ensuring you're alone, and no interruptions. You release the breath you didn't know you were holding and strip off, the gown hanging it on the back of the door.

You try to dismiss the taunting thought of the naked Sakura from your imagination. The bathroom mirror showing your reflection, it's hard not to picture her head and face there. Her cleavage framed by the dressing gown. While the door is solid, and certainly shut, you aren't sure that it's sound-proof or draught-proof, and you fight the urge to relax yourself.

The water is hot and plentiful, and the soaps, shampoos and so forth plentiful. Sniffing a few of the lotions, you find them all rather more fragrant than your usual choices. The rich scents of herbs filling the air, mixing with the rising mist as the bath fills. You spot how lank your hair looks in the mirror, and take a bottle of shampoo to the side of the bath. A bar of peppermint soap is already there, the water bubbles up nicely, filling the room with the scent of ... Jojoba, the bottle says.

It's relaxing, as you sink beneath the water, your muscles relax, and you take a deep breath inhaling the mix. You enjoy the soak, but the different aroma seem to fight for dominance, the bubble bath, against the soap, against the shampoo. Each essential, but happier on it's own.

It's only as the water cools that you realise how long you've been in the water. Thankfully the soak has relieved your other tensions too, and you try to recollect the days events, rather than think of Sakura....

The thick towel makes drying yourself easy as you step onto the bathmat. But once that's done, you feel the chill in the air once more. Doubly so, when a wet foot slaps against the bare stone floor, making you snatch it back. You finger comb your hair into something approaching order, and take a deep calming breath. You now smell as fragrant as all the products, a welter of scents, and herbs hang in a cloud around you.

Double-checking your dressing gown is closed, you leave the bathroom. You resist the urge to retreat back to it's safety, as you see Sakura tucked up in one of the beds. You aren't sure if this is very Japanese, to not care about these things. Or, more likely, they were expecting a 'Danielle', and are having to make do for the night.

But modesty drives you to lift the clothing screen, and use it as a partition between your two beds, giving her... and you some privacy.

With that in place, you slip quickly and smoothly from the dressing gown, and into the empty bed.
11132111.title: You decide to take the bath, it's only poli...

choices: You decide to wait in the room, what's the worst that can happen.
Grasping the thistle, you decide to get dressed. You'll front it out.
Experimentally, you caress the panties, and feel a spark sting your skin.
111321111.content:
Even as you wake to the chimes, you see Sakura slip across your vision. Her toned body, darting with just enough hint of eye-catching wiggle as she headed to the door. You find your grip on the blanket tightening reflexively.

"早く朝ごはん。 Quickly... or you miss breakfast." she warned, before she slipped out the door and away.

Your stomach grumbles, growls in agreement, and you slip from the comfort of the warm bed.

Afraid that she's forgotten something, and alert for the door opening unexpectedly, you slip the dressing gown on to cover your nakedness.

Looking around the room and under the bed, you can't find your luggage. You feel a twinge of fear, you're virtually naked in a girls school. Slapping your head, you curse your early morning grogginess. You head over to the dark mahogany wardrobe. The room already feeling chilly, you're eager to get dressed.

You throw open both doors to see the selection available. It's only a range of school uniforms, the blouses you can pretend to yourself are shirts, but the skirts are undeniably skirts. Ripping open the drawers beneath the hangers, you're confronted with a wide selection of underwear. A wide selection if you're a girl. Panties in various sizes, and bras to cope with all sizes of girls, tights too.

A breeze chooses this moment to remind you of how cool the room is just now.

You open the bottom drawer, your last chance to find your clothes. But they aren't there either.
111321111.title: Awoken by the breakfast bell.

choices: You allow your nose to lead you towards the meal.
You aren't the last to leave your room, so follow one of the girls.
You avoid eye contact, and try to mingle, as... the tallest girl there.
1113211112.content:
The cold in the room seems to be intensifying, and you rub your arms to stimulate some warmth for your body. As you do, you realise that they're smoother than you thought. Shifting to hugging your torso, and rubbing your ribs, you confirm what you suspected. Your skin is smoother, even the lightest, finest hairs have been uprooted and removed.

Cursing the bubblebath, you stamp your feet to get your blood flowing. You stomp into the bathroom, the various contents seem harmless enough. You can't spot any warning marks on the labels, but equally you can't read their Japanese labels well enough either. It was just the scents, and the pictures on the bottles that lead you to assume their contents.

None of this is helping with the basic problem, you're cold, and your breakfast is not served to you in bed.

With a snarl you decide to wear the school uniform. It's only going to be as humiliating .... no, embarrassing as you allow it to be. Any comments, you intend to dismiss as cultural, besides they expected ... Danielle, not you. The possibility that there is anything more suitable for you to wear is unlikely. You can use that as an excuse. Skin rippling, and goosebumps rising, you pick out the panties from the drawer. They slide smoothly into place, and you wiggle your hips into place, not wanting them moving. The soft satin, caresses your crotch, but doesn't exactly warm you. Next you hold up a pair of tights, looking in the mirror to try to find the right length. More questions burst forth as you do, how elastic are these things meant to be? How warming? How much heat will it trap?

Finding a pair that look roughly right, you pull them up. Your smooth skin, and caution allow you to do that without damaging them. As they hug your hips you feel more constrained, and your legs start to warm a little.

Dismissing the bras, you know that's not going to keep any heat. You pull out a ... T-shirt-y thing. With slender silken stringy straps, but it should cover your chest and down to your waist. It's a similiar look to the panties, and you look more intently. The patterned fringe matches, you take this makes a set. You'll cover these things soon. Your small male nipples, stiffen in protest, as it slips down your torso caressing them as it goes. A ripple runs between your shoulders, and you have to assume that the damned bubble-bath... or whatever has made them more sensitive too. Because... well, they just feel more alert and responsive. With a shrug, you move on. Besides, it might just be the cold air, and the sooner you're dressed the better.

Taking out the biggest blouse you hold it up, again checking your reflection. This at least appears thick, cottony and more practical for this climate. The buttons catch you out, wrong damned side, and the shaking of your numb fingers makes it trickier.

Having put it off, for as long as you can, you pick up the first skirt. A grumble of protest slips between your teeth, you clench your jaw to stop your teeth chattering. After looking over three or four skirts, you have to confess none of the are as long as you'd like. None of them could be mistaken as heavy, baggy trousers. The pleats are too plentiful, too neat. Selecting the first one, you find the tiny side zipper and securing button.

A convincing looking girl now looks back at you out the mirror. A slightly too tall, too flat... girl. Even the skirt, works to create the illusion of waist, narrower than you thought. The blazer is the thickest item you have to wear, so you slip your arms into the sleeves.

With a last reluctant breath you gather your courage and prepare to head out and face the world. Or at least, the rest of the school residents.
1113211112.title: Grasping the thistle, you decide to get dressed...

choices: As you eat, you start to notice ... imagine, other changes.
Before your first mouthful, Mistress Kibishii starts to give a speech.
Your knee crashes into the underside of the table, as you feel ....
11132111121.content:
Your nose doesn't lead you astray. The general flow of the other girls... of the girls is in the same direction. Entering the dining room, you feel a smile form. It's like a scaled down version of Hogwarts. At the far end, the teachers' table is raised slightly higher, giving them a view down the length of the four main tables. The student tables are perpendicular to the teachers' and you look for an empty seat.

The idea of being sorted, and the hat spring to mind, "グリフィンドール... Gurifindōru." you say in a low voice to yourself.

You have a copy of book one, in your bag. The hope is that at the end you'll be able to read it all the way through.

Movement catches your eye. You see Sakura waving to you. Her hand low, but she's clearly signalling you, and when your eyes meet, she pats the empty place beside her.

Not wishing to sound sexist, or racist, you only recognised her from her smile. You beam back a smile glad for a friendly face, and a place to sit. As you walk around, you realise how close together everyone, and everything is in this space. You mutter you best apology, whenever you brush against anyone as you squeeze through the gaps. The alienness of the situation, and your own dress makes you feel especially awkward and visible.

Fidgeting with your hair, you make it to the empty place on the bench.

"どうも, domo." you thank Sakura.

As you sit down, you're struck by how soft your hair feels. The bright white porcelain reflects your face. Your hair looks straighter, blacker. It must be the shape of the plate you tell yourself. Or the colour of it. The reasoning doesn't feel convincing to yourself, as you sweep your skirt to sit down.

The soft brush of your hair across your shoulders, is also unsettling. It wasn't that long... well, that long ago. But with your clothes, they might be different... your blazer might be thicker, more padded than you thought.

Once you're sat down, your plate is silently filled, and your glass too. Younger students serving the meal. You give the girl a nod of thanks, as she works.
11132111121.title: You allow your nose to lead you towards the meal.

choices: 'いらっしゃいませ、女の子。 Irasshaimase, onna no ko.' she waves to the door.

111323.content:
Your Japanese isn't very good, and you can't make out much of the sign. But a few of the characters jump out at you.

途方もない女の子のための家

You trace them with your finger dislodging the snow as you go.

'女 Woman... onna'

Catching up with your attempt, a hint of a smile softens her expression.

'子 child er.. ko'

You find yourself struggling to make sense of this, even as you trace out the last one you can work out.

'家 house..school.. uchi?'

You manage to sort your jumbled thoughts from your crude translation, into a coherent thought.

'This is a girls' school?' You squeak the question out, in a more feminine register than you'd like.

She nods towards the sign, and babbles rapidly in Japanese.

'途方もない Touhoumonai onna no ko.'

She repeats the first part more slowly, carefully pronouncing each syllable.
111323.title: Looking for an excuse, you point to the sign.

112.content:
A vacation away from everything is just what the doctor ordered. A few weeks ago by a stroke of luck your name got pulled out of the hat to see exotic China! And now here you are on an all expenses paid vacation, life is good.

It is every bit as wondrous of a place as you had thought. Jade green water fills the lakes, and white capped mountains in the far off distance. There is even a subtle harmony to watch people in cars, on bicycles, and on foot clutter the roads all at the same time.

Thankfully this trip came with a tour guide to lead you first to see the city scape and tomorrows train trip would shoot you out to see the beauty of the lowlands. Of course there are many Chinese women milling about, half of them are not bad at all to look at.

Stretching your wings you headed out to market. All the sights to behold in a Chinese market, this was more visually gripping than what was depicted from Hollywood. A young girl lead you to see an old man who dabbled in "Ancient Chinese Alchemy" His English was terrible, but you humored him best you could. Before going back to the hotel, he gave you a elixir to drink, best not to refuse a gift you thought as the bottle met your lips.

The rest of the night was a blur, And today when you slide out of bed...

Sliding out of bed and walking to the toilet slightly hungover, you unzipped you fly and reached in to pull out "The Hammer". These things happen when drinking, the lil bastard must be tucked off to the side. But again "The Hammer" was not there. Then came the sudden shock, did you lose it in some sort of back alley poker game to a meat cleaver?!?

Dropping your pants, not only was it gone, there was the revelation of lady parts there. This naturally snapped you out of your morning haze. Everything on your body manly was now replaced by silken smooth feminine flesh. Those things on your chest were indeed breasts!

You dashed to the mirror in a panic only to see a panicked Chinese girl looking back. Your hair now almost completely black and straight was the only thing of yesterday left. At least your hair was the same length when you passed out. The next shock came from voices near the door, they were speaking Cantonese, and you understood it with perfect clarity! Somehow, perhaps that elixir, you were now that young Chinese girl you had met last night. The same one that led you by the hand to that old alchemist.

You put on some of your old clothes, at least the ones that fit you best. The rest had become ungainly large, such as your shoes.

Was this a blessing or a curse? As you went for the door of your room...
