As your delicate fingers grabbed the door handle, you knew women had their own problems, but your man problems were now gone. People would now open doors for you, people would pay for things if you smiled, people would treat you differently... perhaps better for just being a woman. There were still those other people, but if being a man taught you anything, the world is filled with white knights.

It was settled. You are a woman now, and you don't want to really go back. First thing, shoes... after all you don't want to walk around China barefoot do you. Walking down the hall and having people look at you was both uncomfortable and exhilarating. Finally the number one man problem was gone, you would no longer be ignored.

choices: Go home with a new identity
113112.content:
The setting sun poured through the snow-capped mountains in the distance and covered Seoul in a golden light, of course no one really noticed. Stan handled jetlag poorly and decided to spend the first night settling into the hotel they would stay at for two weeks. Vivian was flipping through the schedule Stan put together while he slept peacefully. On the ground level their son Keith looked around for something to do.

The boy was provided with his own suite so his Mom and Dad could have plenty of quality time. Nonetheless he wanted some amusement after being cooked up on a plane for an entire day. First he browsed through the gift shop, he couldn’t buy anything because the store didn’t accept pounds. Keith would have to ask his Dad for some won later. As he couldn’t buy a ride anywhere Keith decided to poke around the convention rooms to see what they were doing.

Often enough the conventions themselves were boring but the food was delicious. Keith was far too young to pass himself off as any kind of professional. Normally he avoided crashing most of them. Oddly enough most of the conference rooms were empty.

A simple black board next to one door read Mage Convention. The warm smell of gourmet food wafted from the convention. Keith’s stomach rumbled, his appetite was always small on planes. Now he was definitely in the mood for food. Peeking inside Keith saw nearly a hundred perfectly normal looking people and only a few crowded at the buffet.

Many of the attendees obviously weren't from Asia, so it wouldn’t be terribly difficult for Keith to blend in. Slipping through the door Keith heard cryptic chants as waded through the crowds. Everyone was distracted and it was a simple matter to sink his teeth into pounds of wine-bathed meat and seafood. By the time Keith was finished he barely remembered when had he started. Keith slipped out of the conference room and walked back to his suite. The sun had set and Keith was exhausted, within seconds of returning to his suite he collapsed on the bed.

Keith woke up at afternoon, as always Keith took some minutes to gather his bearings every morning. Slowly he noticed just how large the bed and the suite were. As Keith pulled his head off the pillow long black hair fell in front of his eyes. Grabbing his head made Keith notice that it was much smoother than before. Climbing out of bed revealed a long oriental robe tightly wrapped around his body. More noticeably the robe hugged girlish hips while two perky breast poked out of the bust. Looking around Keith realized the room had not grown, but he had shrunken. Making his way to the bathroom Keith was greeted with a girl in his reflection. The face that gaped back at Keith was round and doll-like with shocked slanted eyes.

Before Keith could have a panic attack the phone began to ring. Desperate to get help Keith jumped at the phone and immediately asked if the caller spoke english. Someone with an american accent simply replied, “Get a job, you thief!” before the call cut off.

Keith ran to his parents’ suite and called out to them in desperation. Stan came to the door and Keith told him everything, in perfect english with a heavy korean accent. Stan was convinced the story was a prank and marched to Keith’s suite and looked around for him. Eventually he got fed up and told the hotel staff to look for Keith. After a day he almost called the police in spite of the hotel manager’s pleas. Interestingly, Keith can understand all the koreans' speech now. That was when Keith turned to Vivian, telling her everything that only they could know about Stan. Vivian finally got Stan to hear Keith out. Keith managed to tell enough embarrassing stories about himself to convince his Dad.

Stan called off the searched and asked about the Mage Convention. The hotel told the family that there was no conference on record with that name.

What happens next?

Flashing the receptionist another beaming smile you head towards the sound of splashing. Your T-shirt and shorts are idea for lounging by the pool, and you find a lounger and a nearby umbrella to keep the sun from burning you.

The reason for the attention is clear. As you see how many of the guests are Korean themselves. You stand out like a giant just by existing.

Lying back, you relax feeling your muscles loosen. You enjoy the scenery, taking in the fragrant air with a deep breath.

121.content:
Your name is Ken. Your not a bad guy, or very bigoted, but you let things get to you when your dad's company is bought out by a Chinese company and they change things in a way that basically forces your dad out of his job. So when a discussion about race comes up in one of your classes, your emotions override your common sense. In spite of having some of your asian classmates in the room, you say, "Well, if you are like me or my dad, we will not be able to find jobs soon cause we are white males. So what difference does it make if I learn all the science there is to learn. A Chinese girl has a better chance now."

To your surpass, your teacher does not get upset, but instead says, "Do you really believe that Ken?"

You cross your arms, "Yes."

She smiles, "Okay. Well, we will see if that turns out to be true. For now, let's change the discussion."

You don't think much of it, though at one point after class, you feel a strange tingle run through your body. You don't feel right, but you don't know why until, when you are going to lunch, you meet your friend Tom. You notice that you seem to be looking Tom straight in the eye, when this morning, you were a good bit taller than him. Yet he does not comment. You ask Tom, "Hey dude. Do you notice anything different about me?"

Tom shrugs his shoulders, "I dunno? You need a haircut?"

You reach up and feel your head, and sure enough, you have much thicker and longer hair than you are used to, but you don't comment. After lunch though, you notice that you are now shorter than Tom! You rush into the bathroom and are surprised to find that not only is your hair much longer and thicker, but it is turning very dark instead of your dirty blonde! For some reason, your face seems to be looking different too.

You go to your math class, dreading the test you are about to take. To your surprise, you find it very easy! You come to the end and push your glasses up to see the clock. You have finished much earlier than the other students! Wait, glasses? You don't wear glasses! You take them off, but suddenly the world is an incomprehensible blur. You can't see the desktop so much as your test without the glasses, so you slip them back on. When did that happen? As you put your glasses back on, you feel that you now have very long hair and it is brushing your shoulders. You even have to brush a lock of dark hair from your eyes.

Your next class is gym. For some reason, every guy in your class is now much taller than you are. As you change, you realize that your package looks like a little boy's, and why is your chest looking puffy? You have no idea what is happening, but as much as you have changed, nobody has seemed to notice. You take your position as normal in the outfield. A ball is hit your way that you are sure you will catch, but you are not much shorter than you are used to, and you misjudge the baseball's flight as it sails over your head. You chase it, feeling very odd. Your glasses slip a moment, and as you pause, and push them back, the ball you were chasing seems to have turned into a softball. You pick it up, and it seems huge even for a softball! Suddenly you hear some girls yelling, "Jun! Throw it here! Quick!" For some reason you throw the ball as best as you can to the nearest girl. But instead of the normal fireball that you would normally through, you very awkwardly throw the ball in a way that barely makes it to the girl on two bounces! As the girl relays to the bases, you feel long hair down your back and something bouncing on your chest.

A different girl, Carisa, says, "Don't feel bad Jun. Nobody expects a geek like to you throw the ball strong. You don't have the arm strength either. Keep trying."

You look down at yourself. Your sneakers are not with with pink trim, you can see and feel small breasts on your chest, and your crotch is feeling strangely empty. An worse, Carisa, who you know is a short girl, is taller than you are! The game goes on, and you do very poorly, and you are confused about why your are playing with the girls and why they keep calling you Jun?

At last, the whistle blows. Without thinking about it, you follow the girls into the locker room. You start to panic, afraid that they will start screaming at you being there, but nobody does. You find yourself in the girl's locker room with girls you had known most of your life. You find yourself going to a locker that feels right, and to you're surprise, you know the combination on the lock. As you undress, you notice that you are now wearing panties and a bra! Not only that, but there is no bulge in the panties where there should be! Worse yet, when you go for your clothes, all you find is a small dress! You hesitate, but for some reason you are compelled to put it on. You end up wearing pantyhose and flats with your dress. You now also have a purse!

You go to your last class, which is chemistry. It is like you are walking through a land of giants in the hall, and nobody there, or in your class, seems to notice anything odd but you. You find chemistry so easy, you excuse yourself to go to the bathroom. You find yourself compelled to use the girl's bathroom. As you go in, you see a full-length mirror and are shocked, in the mirror you see a petite asian girl, probably Chinese by her look, wearing glasses, a dress with a short skirt, and long, dark hair almost to her waist. She moves as you move, and as you approach the mirror, you realize that this is you! In a very high and feminine voice you say, "What is happening to me?"

When you go to pee, you find your transformation if as deep as it looks as your are fully female, and you must sit to pee. You seem to know how to take care of yourself, but what is going on? How did this happen?

You finish and return to class. With school over, it is time to go home. You return home to find...

You are now a Chinese orphan adopted by your same parents
Your father is yelling in the living room as he reads the paper. Your mother is sitting with him. "Would you look at this? Another company bought by the Chinese! And instead of filling it with proper, hard working Americans; they dismissed them for more of their countrymen! What is wrong with this country that we just let them take over the nation?" he roared. "Honey, it will be alright!" your mother replied. "And how long sweetheart until the Chinese take over your marketing firm and throw you out? I've been an electrician for 25 years until they canned me!" he bellowed.

Since that you are now Chinese, you whimpered a little and you worry that maybe you’re in the wrong house. “Jun, sweetheart!” calls out your mother when she sees you. “Darling, how was school?” she declared, wrapping her arms around you. “It was fine, Mum!” you answer. She beamed at you, kissing your forehead. “Well sweetheart, you better go up to your room and to do your homework!” she exclaimed.

“Yes, Mum!” you replied. The phone rang and your mum answered. “Sweetheart, its’ your girlfriend Carissa!” called out your mum. You stepped down to answer, annoyed that Carissa wasn’t your girlfriend that way. “Hi Carissa!” you reply. “Hi cutie! Can I come over? I could really use some help with my homework!” she asked. “Yeah, that would be fine!” you respond. “Maybe check with your parents?” she suggested. “Oh yeah, just a sec!” you put your hand over the phone and asked your mother if Carissa could come over. “Of course she can, sweetheart! Just don’t close your bedroom door! You know how your father and I feel about that!” your mother answered.

It was a strange answer but you shrug it off and invited Carissa over. There was a knock on the door and Carissa was waiting outside. She beams and wraps her arms around you. This is the high point of your day so far. But then you hear something that makes it better. “God, you’re hot! I could barely think watching you in that tight skirt all day! I want you!” she whispered. Carissa was your girlfriend that way! You were a Chinese lesbian and your parents clearly knew.

They were however obviously now your adopted parents. You had so many questions. But for now you watched as Carissa spoke to your parents, her winning smile seemed to cheer up your father and brightened up your mother. “Well, I need your wonderful daughter to help with my homework! Thank you Mr Harrison; Ms Harrison!” she declared as she took your hand and you ran up to your bedroom.

It was painted nauseating pink, but with photos and posters of female singers, actresses and a few swimsuit models. You were without question a Chinese lesbian. She grins at you again as she pats the bed. You sit next to her, your heart pounding. “I take it Ken, this is quite scary for you?” she asked. Your eyes grow so wide, they almost explode out of your sockets.

“Yes, I know! What you said about Chinese girls, well it really upset me! You see I had a Chinese girlfriend called Jun Xiaoping who died in a hit and run. It hurt me the way you spoke about Chinese girls and now you are one! Your parents lost their son Ken when he was 13. That’s was when they adopted you, their pretty little orphan. You should know that I completed my homework before I got here!” she explained.

“Are you saying…” “Jun, you have a choice. You can accept your situation for the time being and I will kiss you softly on the lips. An option we will both enjoy!” she paused to beam at you squeezing your hand. “Doing this means we are dating officially! Or you can ask me how you became Jun. I will not view this positively.” She added, her eyes going cold. You shivered slightly. “So either you choose to accept this, I kiss you as your lesbian girlfriend. Or you ask how it happened and deal with the consequences! Obviously your parents don’t know you are their late son Ken, but they know you like girls. Or they know for now!”

You made up your mind, quickly. It wasn’t much of a choice, really. You....

I have hired a wizard to help enact these changes, right here." He gestured to a tall man, wearing long, flowing robes.

1343.content:
You are Daniel Johnson, an average 16-year old male highschool student. Average build, average height, average face, average everything. If you had worked for a movie-company you would have been hired as a crowd-extra instantly because of your ability to melt into any group of people like a shadow.

But you did have one distinguishing feature, you wore spectacles. Unlike the norm, where you would have been classified as nerdy, your glasses accented your already sharp eyes giving you a distinguished look and an air of intelligence. It had earned you the nickname of "Professor", a title used far more out of respect from your peers than out of degradation, for you were quite clever.

You were the youngest person in your school's history to have completed the International Advanced Program of Mathematics at this point in age; your academic future looked bright. And for this you represented the school's mathematics club; yes, a most boring and unimpressive position to your friends, but to your employers of the future a goldmine.

Today was Valentines day, a traditional school holiday, which was why you were walking to the mall instead of the schoolgrounds.
The reason: your idiot friend Jake was dumped yesterday afternoon, the very day before Valentines day, and now like so many times before, you've been called to cheer up the fool whilst he sulked.
You shake your head; it had started a week ago.

Megan, the cheerleading captain, had asked your friend Jake to be her valentine-sweetheart. He had of course agreed immediately, without a second thought.
Now you hated Megan with a passion. For you had always thought that the so called 'popular' arch villains in chick-flicks, whom were the most shallow, airheaded and bimbolike were retardedly overly steriotypically characterised. That no women in reality could be so without depth. Until you met Megan of course: she was nothing short of a bitch. You absolutely despised both her, her treatment of others and her hideous overuse of the word "totally" in every single bloody sentence she uttered.

You had warned Jake not to take her up; that she was trouble. But he of course ignored you and accused you of coming between his relationship, of not being happy for him, for bla bla bla, a whole lot of other things someone brainwashed would say.
You had predicted that she was taking Jake for a fast one, none paid you any attention, the main reason being that you had no valentines date of your own, that you were being a jealous sure prune.

You didn't care to correct them. You could care less what others thought. The truth was that you also had a date earlier with your childhood friend Cindy; even though neither of you were lovers, for she did have a sweetheart of her own in another town, you two still wanted to treat one another nicely for the day. Yet you were also dumped 3 days earlier, but Cindy had a valid excuse, her granmother had passed away, today was burial. You took it in good humour. Not the same for Jake and Megan; he was devastated.

You regret having been proved right when yesterday you had heard Megan made quite a show in from of a lot of others, humiliating poor Jake, whom had brought her flowers and chocolates and various other gifts, by announcing that she had no intention of going out with a 'loser' such as him, and would instead go out with Gunther, the Football-captain. You heard poor Jake was thoroughly mocked. Strangely enough, last night Gunther had called you asking for Jake to apologise, he didn't know about Jake and Megan and wanted to say personally that he was sorry. You just despised Megan even more.

You sighed as you walked, now almost to the mall. You weren't annoyed at Jake for not listening to you earlier or even having to cheer him up, for he was a good sort at heart. No. What pissed you off was Jake's inabillity to let things go. Last night Jake visited you, past bloody 9-o clock too, and announced with pride that he had found the solution to both your problems. Apparently the imbecile had waddled through the flea-market in his depression when a gypsy had stopped him. According to Jake she looked every bit the part of a witch, but had had a friendly goofy toothless grin, and had told him that she could solve his sadness with some powerful magical artefacts. She had sold him 2 arm bracelets, stating that the wearers would obtain the presence of their own ideal sweethearts and that.....

Oh for the love of sweet mercy! You couldn't believe your friend Jake could have been swindled into buying such useless crap; to make it worse he appeared to have paid a vast sum too. Jake had always held a fascination with the supernatural, fortunetelling and Horoscopes, whilst you - with your analytical mathematical mind - could never be persuaded to believe in something that couldn't be explained without numbers or facts.

You just shake your head looking at the ugly silver bracelet you now wore on your on your left forearm, Jake had whined until you had agreed to wear the piece of junk, apparently the lack of a girlfiriend on your part not bothering you not getting to him; a dragon and other unidentifyable mythical beasts decorated it. Well so far buggerall had happened, which was probably why Jake had called you to your favorite Cafe, to help him get over his back-up plan failing. The idiot. Still, you couldn't leave him hanging

As you entered the town-mall, you rubbed your chest, for it felt swollen and irritated, but you paid it no mind, as you exited the early morning sun and into the synthetic lights of the mall interior, eager to get to your friend Jake.

142.content:
Oh the rush of watching your opponent get crushed. What a great feeling! Every day people came up and put down two tokens on the machine to challenge your mad skills. Everyday, you would walk away with a massive win versus loss ratio. After all losing to some random guy or a regular wasn't so bad, you would learn from their combos and flip the game to your advantage. Being this good at every installment of the Street Fighter franchise was a gift from the digital gods.

That was up until that last set of matches yesterday... You had never seen her before. Some petite Asian girl from out of town. She was quiet and focused on brutalizing you in front of the whole arcade. Really she didn't look like much, short black hair, rail thin, and dressed in the most disgustingly cute outfit of dark clothes highlighted in pink and white. The Hello Kitty hair clips were the final cherry on top.

Like everyone else, she came up to the machine with two tokens to challenge you. At first you thought she might be a scene girl jumping into gaming to impress her boyfriend or something. Soon you found, she is a hardcore gamer, and she earned those calloused thumbs.
The first loss you took with your usual stoic mannerisms, lesson learned. But she just whipped on you, and each time she chose a new female character to do it with. Finally with the losses racking up she plainly asked you the question that changed your life.

"Why you only play men?"

In your brashness, and being sore to losing to a girl, you answered. "Girls are weak, even in fighting games! A real fight, guys always win!" The small Asian girl walked away smiling at your answer to her inquiry. Her reply, made you uneasy.

"Okay then, I'll see ya round... Chun Li." The name Chun Li, she said with just a hint of venom.

The rest of the day was the usual thing, beating everyone else at the arcade until the shop closed for the evening. When you awoke the next day and rolled out of bed, hit the shower, and while checking out your manliness in the mirror the oddest urge hit you.

You nearly gave up on becoming a professional singer as the famous Japanese producer Kei Osaki called you. Up until then you never had heard of him, but after googling you found out he was the most famous producer in Japan, producing many No.1 singer and bands. You couldn't believe he had called you wanting to produce you. But he called a second and a third time making clear he wouldn't stop until you agreed. After you did the contract came by mail. It was threefold, two in Japanese, which you couldn't read, and one in English.
You signed the two Japanese contracts after reading the English one. After sending them back you began packing your bags. In the contract stood you had to come to Tokyo for at least the next year. If by then you didn't made it you would get a very good compensation and could go back. But you are determined to make it and now that you are at Narita-Airport you can't go back.

Johnson Kyle stands on a board a man in a black suit is holding. You walk towards him.
"Johnson-san?" He asks before making a bow. "Welcome to Japan."
You don't really know what to say, so you make a little bow.
"I am Taku Matsumoto, personal assistant of Mister Osaki." He says in his broken English making an other bow. "I am here to help you getting to Tokyo. Please let me carry your bag." He takes your bag and walks so fast away you have a little trouble following him.

1513.content:
You'd taken a year out from your university studies to travel the world, and as you toured the Pacific Rim you found your money running low, in Tokyo.

You hadn't realised how expensive Tokyo was for the cost of living. But it was such a busy and vibrant place, that you decided to try and stay for a few months. The chance to improve your Japanese was also tempting. Although you can muddle your way through a simple conversation, you want, you need to improve your language skills.

So here you are turning up for work, for the first day, working as the Takahashi company's American Liaison.

Taking a deep breath you pass some secretaries on the steps outside. While they aren't terribly overladen with curves, they are still wearing some marvellously tight, and smart clothes.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

You put on your best suit, and headed up to the fifteenth floor. Checking your introduction package, you see that Miss Tanaka is your immediate boss, and there's a picture of stern looking woman paperclipped to the top of that sheet of paper.

As the elevator door pings, and opens you see your new boss. Introducing yourself, in your best if rather stilted Japanese you give her a deep bow.

"Robin-kun?"

Standing up straight again, you confirm that you are Robin Whittaker.

"But isn't Robin... a girl's name?" she asks. She has a strong accent, but speech is still clear.

"It can be either for a man or a woman." you explain.

She accepts this with a curt nod, but she doesn't look very happy, as she leads you to your position. As you walk, you nod and smile to everyone you pass. As the big, coarse gaijin, you draw everyone's eye, as you tower over Miss Tanaka by about a foot.

It looks like you're the only non-Japanese on this floor, and as Miss Tanaka points to your seat, you realise you're also the only man, too.

15131.content:
You're happy to show off your Japanese, after a year walking and working around the country, you feel quite proficient.

With crisp perfect tones, you answer the phone take the message. You even make the effort to write it in Kanji and Kana for Miss Tanaka. Integrating in Japanese society was tricky, and you feel a distance even now. Though, as a guy you weren't that tall in your home town, a 'Shrimp', in some opinions, at just over 5' tall, you fit better here. Not towering over everyone like some Gaijin.

A year of eating Japanese cooking, has left you more slender and lighter. Keeping your naturally midnight hair short also helps.

Passing the message to Miss Tanaka, she looks intently at it. You feel her judging your calligraphy, as well as the message itself.

"Are you prepared to try and fit in?" her question feels like the last hurdle, and your funds are running low.

"Certainly." you answer.

With this, she leads you away, you swell with pride. Though, you feel the centre of a lot of attention as you pass row after row of cubicles, some of the office girls smiling at some secret joke. Or perhaps, just surprised by their first gaijin. A man no taller than them, and nothing like the Hollywood heroes, or television depictions of an American male.

Perhaps your own preferences are changing too. As you enjoy the tight clothes of the girls. The shortness of the skirts, accentuating the slight curves. There's barely one with more than a discreet A-cup, but everywhere there's temptation. One girl retrieving a file from a bottom drawer surely can't be that oblivious.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/597bf290ff2b2...

You let out a low, grunting breath in appreciation.

Others you pass, looking at you, flash a range of emotions: interest, then amusement, then a flicker of pity.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/3c15dc2c6775c...

Some size you up, more dismissively, you assume these are the more experienced managerial women. You hope despite your age, with your varied experiences and background you can soon join their ranks.

"You need to fit in." she reminds you, as she guides you into a quiet room. You only enter a few paces, as the light is off. With Miss Tanaka at your heels, she flicks on the light switch. As the florescent lights flicker on, you see a selection of office appropriate clothes lit up.

155122.content:
You don't want to confess to the secretary how much you need the money. With your savings running low, and no other prospects a $50,000 payday and free accommodation for a month feels like a no-brainer.

The problem... nah... more of a concern, is you haven't heard of them before. While you're no troll, you can't pretend to keep up on the latest trends in male grooming, beyond the basics. The chance to boost your knowledge and present your best self is a nice bonus.

Arriving at the lab, you feel your anxieties ease, as you see a plush modern facility.

女性の美しさ
Joseino utsukushisa

The name emblazoned in large clear letters above, the main entrance.

Even as you enter, the receptionist rises from her desk, and gives you a deep bow.

"Mr. Williams-san?" her voice lifting just enough to suggest a question.

"I'm Haruko Tanaka. This way please."

Smiling and nodding you, look around for the paper copy of the e-mail. But she's already gesturing for you to head towards the bank of elevators. Her uniform is crisp and perfect, her English a little stilted and formal, but lacks the ease of familiarity. You tower over her by a full head and shoulders.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/3ab1208dc14e...

Her uniform is smart, but clearly her position is secretarial. Your eyes drift to her slender physique, and her petite arse as she leads you towards the elevators. Her long legs well displayed by the quite short, but still respectful skirt.

As you near the elevator doors, you raise your gaze. Not wanting her to see where you rest your look in the reflection of the doors. Trying to distract yourself, you wonder if she's also a candidate or a model for their procedures. She was certainly attractive enough.

The elevator rises smoothly, and your guide leads you to one of the desk. The room is set out with a variety of cubicles, and you spot a few smiles, as you walk behind her.

You're a little surprised, when the doors open onto the floor with the various laboratories. It looks like all the secretaries are Japanese, you see a few blushing faces, a few hands covering mouths as gossip spills between neighbouring desk. You feel even more like Godzilla, looming over all these women. You resist the urge to stomp more loudly, like a giant. The impulse makes you smile.

"James-san?"

A brief, fast conversation between the two girls happens in Japanese. At the end, the receptionist smiles an apology to you, for the rudeness. Picking up a sheaf, of twenty pages stapled together, she flicks to the back page, and the empty line for you to sign. A pencil 'x' marking the spot.

"If you wish to proceed."

You idly glance at various points, and while it's not complex, the form is filled with jargon. You nod as if you're reading it intently, until you see what you're looking for, the $50,000, and the section about both you requiring to undergo the procedure, and their obligation to pay you the required sum.

Accepting the pen, you clip it onto the contract.

"Laboratory, now." she smiles a hint of pride in her voice.

- - - - -

Leaving the elevator the second time, the view could hardly be more different. The rows of secretaries replaced with banks of scientific equipment. A distracted woman comes towards you, "Mr... Williams James..." she frowns.

"Mr. James Williams. Welcome. I'm Professor Sakura Manko."

Her English is heavily accented, and you have to strain to make out what she's saying. The receptionist stands a little straighter, a little taller, with the scientist eager to explain what's involved. Her lab coat is a pristine white, and you wonder if she actually does any science here, or if she's more of a director.

You know height is no guide to intelligence, but it feels odd to also stand about a foot taller than Professor Manko.

The tour doesn't reveal much, as you struggle to understand Professor Manko's enthusiasm comes across, although this makes her English even harder to understand. At first you ask Haruko, to explain when you have a question. However, it becomes clear that the explanation is rather technical, and Haruko's vocabulary not familiar with those terms... at least in English. You want to show you're paying attention.

You also detect after the third question, that she's reluctant to sound like she's contradicting a superior, and her answers, aren't really clearing much up for you. The tour only lasts another ten minutes, and you mirror the Professor's smiles, and head nods.

It ends with you in Prof. Manko's office, you sitting opposite her. An expectant smile on her face, and Haruko standing behind you. A tilt of her head, towards the paperwork tells you it's time to sign the contract.

She reaches into a drawer, and fetches out a pen. As you reach for it, she waves her hands in warning. Looking more carefully, you feel a chill, it's a syringe. Suddenly the whole scene feels like a horror movie. The look on your face must be a picture, as the Professor waves.

"Pain.... anaesthetic..."

Not the most calming choice of words, and she looks past your shoulder to Haruko, a look on her face, asking if she's using the correct words.

Haruko smiles and nods, settling a hand on your shoulder.

"The full procedure can be painful, and to ease this we have prepared an anaesthetic."

You hadn't fully realised what was involved, assuming it was testing cosmetics. You hadn't guessed, and you still aren't sure but it feels like some surgery is involved. You aren't sure. You've never felt closer to the $50,000, and you would feel like a tease to have taken this tour, and then not proceed.

Hand trembling, you reach to sign the contract. Passing it across to the professor, she signs the following page. Satisfied, she leads you through, to a pristine white room. A long bench like bed, is against one wall, and she pats it to invite you to settle there. Looking backwards you see Haruko hasn't followed.

Regretting not having the chance to thank her, or say good-bye. You turn towards the professor who is miming for you to take off your shirt. You feel warm and fuzzy, as the needle slides home. Your blood spreading like warm treacle, as the overhead lights blur into a white landscape.
